com.erikligai.doctorplzsaveme.Models

Class Problem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erikligai.doctorplzsaveme.Models.Problem

  • public class Problem
extends java.lang.Object
    Problem class that stores info about a patient's specific problem Contains CP comments, Records belonging to the problem, etc
